title: Critical Reception of Asian Expressions: Exploring Media Narratives

context.prior_knowledge: Basic media literacy and understanding of cultural diversity
context.additional_context: Structured as hands-on participatory activities, including content creation and discussions facilitated via smartphones.

learning_goals: Learners can critically analyze representation methods of Asian expressions across diverse media types (film, advertising, SNS)
Learners can logically explain the social impact of multiculturalism propaganda through case studies
Learners complete collaborative projects proposing alternative representation strategies by comparing contrasting media narratives

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
